title: Jersey Shore's Ronnie Ortiz-Magro and Jen Harley 'call it quits once and for all'
text:
Jersey Shore's Ronnie Ortiz-Magro and Jen Harley have split up 'for good', days after his domestic violence arrest.

The volatile couple are said to have 'called it quits once and for all' after the reality TV personality, 33, was arrested and tasered last week for allegedly chasing Jen, 32, with a knife while holding their 18-month-old daughter Ariana Sky.

Both realise 'their daughter's safety is jeopardised when they're together' and Jen is reportedly planning 'to seek a restraining order against Ronnie for her and Ariana'.

It's over (again): Jersey Shore's Ronnie Ortiz-Magro and Jen Harley have split up 'for good', days after his domestic violence arrest (pictured together last week)

A source close to the situation told TMZ: 'Both Ronnie and Jen feel like the domestic incident from last week was the straw that broke the camel's back... they realise they can't continue on in a relationship...

'Their daughter's safety is jeopardised when they're together, and they can't risk that anymore.'

The on-off pair - who have previously split on numerous occasions - are believed to have 'reached this conclusion separately' and 'disagree over who is at fault' for the explosive row.

Both have admitted there is 'no going back from this fight' and sources close to Jen told TMZ she is 'concerned about their daughter's well-being and is vowing to never put her in a situation like that again'.

In happier times: The volatile couple are said to have 'called it quits once and for all' after the reality TV personality, 33, was arrested and tasered last week

Ronnie was arrested in the early hours of Friday for 'striking Jen and chasing her around their rented Los Angeles apartment with a knife as he held their daughter Ariana Sky'.

The star was released later on Friday after he paid a $100,000 bail fee and was hit with an emergency protective order requiring him to stay 100-yards away from Jen and their child.

Sources close to Jen said she is claiming Ronnie dragged her across the driveway at the couple's Airbnb home.

The alleged dragging is said to have happened after Jen was seen on a neighbour's surveillance camera with Ariana.

Concerned: Both realise 'their baby daughter's safety is jeopardised when they're together' and Jen is reportedly planning 'to seek a restraining order against Ronnie for her and Ariana'

A source close to Ronnie told the website Ronnie alleged Jen injured her shoulder falling off a fence as he took their child from her.

It was also claimed Ronnie is alleging Jen was clinging to him as he tried to return to the house with the baby, and that is when she sustained the leg injury.

The source also suggested Jen had been drinking heavily during an event earlier in the day, and that is why Ronnie was concerned for Ariana's safety.

In the incident which led to Ronnie's arrest, it was reported police had to 'break down the door' of the rental because Ronnie had refused to leave voluntarily and there were fears over Ariana's safety.

Volatile: The on-off pair - who have previously split on numerous occasions - are believed to have 'reached this conclusion separately' and 'disagree over who is at fault' for the row

Officers then used a taser on the reality star.

A video from Fox 11 showed officers placing a shirtless Ronnie on a gurney in a seated position and restraining his hands.

The latest bust-up follows a string of incidents between the warring pair, with Jen recently being cleared of domestic battery following a fight in Las Vegas on New Year's Eve where Ronnie claimed she threw an ashtray at his head.

Ronnie and Jen have waged very public battles against each other for the last two years as they dated and broke up multiple times.

Their most recent break-up came just last month when Jen took to Instagram to accuse Ronnie of cheating on her by posting a photo of him with his arm around a mystery woman during a boat party.
description: The volatile couple are said to have 'called it quits once and for all' after the reality TV personality, 33, was arrested last week for chasing Jen, 32, with a knife while holding their 18-month-old daughter.
